2022 Msc

2022 SEP — 2025 SEP · Supervisor: Gangmin Ning

Research in health status monitoring and computational methods; thesis focused on multimodal signals.

Thesis explored multimodal fusion of physiological signals for robust health state estimation. Contributed to two conference submissions and assisted in coursework for undergrads.
